titleInfo.title: Ben Englander Standing on a Sidewalk

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#460 JCRS Staff''. Handwritten notes on back of photograph: ''Ben Englander, State representative of Colo. Board member JCR''.

mods.abstract: Ben Englander standing on a sidewalk. Englander was the State Representative of Colorado and a Board Member of the Jewish Consumptives' Relief Society (JCRS). The JCRS was a sanatorium for tuberculosis patients that was founded in 1904 by a group of immigrant Jewish workingmen along with the support of several leading physicians and rabbis in Denver, Colorado. It was located on West Colfax Avenue just outside Denver.
mods.note: Accession # 1271, Donated by AMC Cancer Research Center as part of the JCRS Records.
